translator
Class ActivatableVisitor

java.lang.Object
  xtc.tree.Visitor
      translator.ActivatableVisitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavaClass, JavaFile
abstract class ActivatableVisitor
extends xtc.tree.Visitor

Create a visitor structure that only processes classes on demand. This makes our processing faster as only files/classes that are actually needed are ever processed.

          If the visitor has been activated / used.

process

protected abstract void process()
For doing the dispatching on the item. Sometimes they need to do more work before they are ready to dispatch, so give them that time here.
